ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let data=JSON.parse(result).data
let chapterList=[]
for(var volume of data){
	chapterList.push({
		name:volume.volume_name,
		isVolume:true,
		info:volume.volume_desc
		})
		for(var chapter of volume.chapter_list){
			var isVip=chapter.chapter_ispay==0?"":"ğŸ’°"
			var time=java.timeFormat(chapter.chapter_time*1000)
			chapterList.push({
				name:isVip+chapter.chapter_name,
				isVolume:false,
				info:`æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´:`+time+` å­—æ•°:${chapter.chapter_number}`,
				url:`/api/readWithEncrypt?chapter_id=${chapter.chapter_id}&nid=${chapter.chapter_nid}&preload=0`
				})
			}
	}
chapterList
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('è´¦å·ï¼š');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken"))).length == 0) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('âœ£ã€' + Account + 'ã€‘âœ£', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('æ”¶è—', `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18`, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
}
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=2`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('æ’è¡Œ', url1, 1, 0.2, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=4`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('æ–°ä½œ', url2, 1, 0.2, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=5`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('å®Œç»“', url3, 1, 0.2, false));
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ã€€ã€€ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&cateid=${kind[i].value}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].label, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

headers={

}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

'ã€–é»˜è®¤ã€—' : 'ã€–è‡ªé€‰ã€—') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\nğŸ“°è¯„è®ºé¡µæ•°ï¼šã€–' + (Get('f') == 5 ? 'é»˜è®¤' : 'è‡ªé€‰') + 'ã€—å‰' + Get('f') + 'é¡µ') + ('\nğŸ“è¯„è®ºæ’åºï¼šã€–' + (Get('r') == 0 ? var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var category = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
    if (/mh-collect/.test(baseUrl)) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].episodes,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].mhid
            });
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kinds = [];
            var kindElements = list[i].cateids ? list[i].cateids.split(',') : [];
            for (var j in kindElements) {
                kinds.push(String(category[kindElements[j]-1].label));
            }
            kind1 = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
            var kind = 'âœ¦ ' + Num(list[i].readnum) + ',' + 'â™¥ ' + Num(list[i].reader) + ',' + kind1;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].author.replace(/[&|,_Ã—]/g, '/').replace(/\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+(\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/ï¼ˆ/g, '(').replace(/ï¼‰/g, ')').replace(/\/+/g, '/'),
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].episodes + 'ã€”' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].updateTime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + 'ã€•',
                'intro': list[i].summary,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].id
            });
        }
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pageNo=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pageNo=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.list[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=100&word=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '');
}(key));
</js>
